content.en: Algorithmic manufacturing optimization: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms in manufacturing to improve decision-making, production planning, scheduling, control, and quality control. These algorithms, such as expert systems and artificial intelligence techniques, are being applied to various aspects of manufacturing systems. However, there is still a gap between theoretical studies and practical applications of these algorithms in manufacturing planning and scheduling.
content.da: Algoritmisk produktionsoptimering: Forskere har udforsket brugen af algoritmer i produktion for at forbedre beslutningstagning, produktionsplanlægning, planlægning, kontrol og kvalitetskontrol. Disse algoritmer, såsom ekspertsystemer og kunstig intelligens teknikker, anvendes på forskellige aspekter af produktionssystemer. Der er dog stadig et gap mellem teoretiske studier og praktiske anvendelser af disse algoritmer i produktionsplanlægning og -planlægning.
